name: Wyvern Knight
description: A Medium-sized humanoid clad in plate armor and wielding a lance, the Wyvern Knight serves as a formidable opponent on the battlefield and displays an imposing demeanor.
memorable: The Wyvern Knight can inflict poisons and has the tactical capability to protect allies with a special reaction.
goals: To serve as a mounted warrior, exploiting its poisonous abilities and protecting allies in battle.
relations: May command a war wyvern and likely interacts with other knightly or draconic beings.
environment: Typically found in military encampments or regions where wyverns are common.
strengths: High armor class and poison attacks make it a durable and dangerous opponent.
weaknesses: Average Dexterity limits agility and it has disadvantage when attacking close targets.
attacks: Utilizes a lance for melee attacks, long-range heavy crossbow shots, and a dagger for versatility, all enhanced with poison damage.
most_powerful_ability: Multiattack that allows for two lance strikes and the ability to command a mount to attack.
equipment: Wears plate armor and carries a lance, heavy crossbow, and dagger.
senses: Exhibits passive Perception of 14, allowing for better detection of threats.
skills: Proficient in Perception, providing an advantage in combat awareness.
additional_information: Immune to poison damage and resistant to poison effects.
Has the Brave ability granting advantage against fear.
Carries a Ring of Feather Falling for safe descents.
Effective at protecting allies with the Protection reaction.
Wields a lance in one hand while mounted, allowing versatility.
test_queries: durable armored knight with poison attacks
lawful evil creature commanding poisonous wyverns
